Resume of Chen Fan 陈凡

*** * [1. Objectives](#objectives) * [2. Contact](#contact) * [3. Education](#education) * [4. Certificate](#certificate) * [5. Experience](#experience)

 

1. Objectives

Hi, I am Chen Fan. I have been working as a java coder and enthusiastic about coding (so much to learn). I aspire to further my programming knowledge, skills and vision of the evolving internet. I firmly believe that internet driven services will flourish through innovations and connection to other industries thus I wish to participate this exploratory process. I believe I could contribute to business success with combination of my experience, creativity, team spirit, most importantly learning ability. Thanks and best regards.

meta.title: Tushare, the library used to fetch financial data

data.excerpt:
Tushare, Financial data python library

[Tushare](http://tushare.org/){target="_blank"} *Tushare is a free, open sourced python financial data interface library*. Its primary features include collecting data of financial, such as stock; cleaning data and storing data, which provides financial analysts with quick, neat, and diversy data for analysis, reduces difficulty on data collection for them, allows them to focus more on realization of strategy and modeling....

what about this article

### What is React-static [react-static](https://react-static.js.org/) is a static web page generator. We can define some functions in static.config.js to load data, and render these data with templates built by react components. These templates are also organized by [React-Static Route](https://github.com/react-static/react-static/blob/master/docs/api.md#routes)

meta.title: Study of H2 the Java SQL database

data.excerpt:
Study of H2 the Java SQL database

I want to study more about database, not just how to query and store data. I wish to know how a database is built, what concerns are to be addressed. I figure [h2databasae](https://h2database.com) could be a good starting point
